test_name: GDS total score cannot be valid if GDS was not attempted
full_desc: IF QG1. NOGDS (Check if GDS not attempted) =1 then Q16. GDS (Total GDS score) must =88

test_name: GDS total score cannot be valid if GDS was not attempted
short_desc: IF NOGDS=1 then there cannot be >=12 questions with valid scores (0 or 1)
full_desc: IF NOGDS=1 then there cannot be >=12 questions with valid scores
test_logic: IF NOGDS=1 and >=12 of the following variables ne 9 (SATIS, DROPACT, EMPTY, BORED, SPIRITS, AFRAID, HAPPY, HELPLESS, STAYHOME, MEMPROB, WONDRFUL, WRTHLESS, ENERGY, HOPELESS, BETTER)
comp_vars: GDS, NOGDS, SATIS, DROPACT, EMPTY, BORED, SPIRITS, AFRAID, HAPPY, HELPLESS, STAYHOME, MEMPROB, WONDRFUL, WRTHLESS, ENERGY, HOPELESS, BETTER

test_name: GDS total score is equal to sum of all valid questions for completed GDS
short_desc: If at least 12 of (SATIS, DROPACT, EMPTY, BORED, SPIRITS, AFRAID, HAPPY, HELPLESS, STAYHOME, MEMPROB, WONDRFUL, WRTHLESS, ENERGY, HOPELESS, BETTER) in (0,1), then GDS must equal sum of all subquestions in (0,1)
full_desc: If at least 12 of (Q1. SATIS, Q2. DROPACT, Q3. EMPTY, Q4. BORED, Q5. SPIRITS, Q6. AFRAID, Q7. HAPPY, Q8. HELPLESS, Q9. STAYHOME, Q10. MEMPROB, Q11. WONDRFUL, Q12. WRTHLESS, Q13. ENERGY, Q14. HOPELESS, Q15. BETTER) in (0,1), then then Q16. GDS must equal sum of (Q1. SATIS, Q2. DROPACT, Q3. EMPTY, Q4. BORED, Q5. SPIRITS, Q6. AFRAID, Q7. HAPPY, Q8. HELPLESS, Q9. STAYHOME, Q10. MEMPROB, Q11. WONDRFUL, Q12. WRTHLESS, Q13. ENERGY, Q14. HOPELESS, Q15. BETTER) where in (0,1)
test_logic: If at least 12 of (SATIS, DROPACT, EMPTY, BORED, SPIRITS, AFRAID, HAPPY, HELPLESS, STAYHOME, MEMPROB, WONDRFUL, WRTHLESS, ENERGY, HOPELESS, BETTER) in (0,1) and GDS ne SUM(SATIS, DROPACT, EMPTY, BORED, SPIRITS, AFRAID, HAPPY, HELPLESS, STAYHOME, MEMPROB, WONDRFUL, WRTHLESS, ENERGY, HOPELESS, BETTER) where in (0,1)
comp_vars: GDS, SATIS, DROPACT, EMPTY, BORED, SPIRITS, AFRAID, HAPPY, HELPLESS, STAYHOME, MEMPROB, WONDRFUL, WRTHLESS, ENERGY, HOPELESS, BETTER

test_name: NOGDS is blank when GDS was attempted
short_desc: IF NOGDS is blank then there must be at least 12 questions (SATIS, DROPACT, EMPTY, BORED, SPIRITS, AFRAID, HAPPY, HELPLESS, STAYHOME, MEMPROB, WONDRFUL, WRTHLESS, ENERGY, HOPELESS, BETTER) with valid scores (0 or 1)
full_desc: IF QG1. NOGDS (Check if GDS not attempted) is blank then at least 12 of Q1. SATIS, Q2. DROPACT, Q3. EMPTY, Q4. BORED, Q5. SPIRITS, Q6. AFRAID, Q7. HAPPY, Q8. HELPLESS, Q9. STAYHOME, Q10. MEMPROB, Q11. WONDRFUL, Q12. WRTHLESS, Q13. ENERGY, Q14. HOPELESS, Q15. BETTER must be 0 or 1
test_logic: IF NOGDS is blank and <12 of (SATIS, DROPACT, EMPTY, BORED, SPIRITS, AFRAID, HAPPY, HELPLESS, STAYHOME, MEMPROB, WONDRFUL, WRTHLESS, ENERGY, HOPELESS, BETTER) are 0 or 1
comp_vars: GDS, NOGDS, SATIS, DROPACT, EMPTY, BORED, SPIRITS, AFRAID, HAPPY, HELPLESS, STAYHOME, MEMPROB, WONDRFUL, WRTHLESS, ENERGY, HOPELESS, BETTER
